issue.title: [Python] Implement to_numpy on ChunkedArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8350](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8350). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We support `to_numpy` on Array instances but not on `ChunkedArray` instances. It would be quite useful to have it also there to support returning e.g. non-nanosecond datetime instances.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8350?focusedCommentId=17076936) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
We already support the `__array__` protocol and get the right output there, so this is not needed.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8350?focusedCommentId=17585815) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
